name: Pirpirate
description:
Manage your crew to avoid you boat to skin. Keep it afloat as long as possible.
Use left click to select a character, then asign him a task: fix, throw out water and barricade. Sometimes you will have to sacrifice your sailors to prevent water from spreading.

Team:
